events.name: BatchTemperatureMonitoring
events.description: To ensure that temperature within the batch is consistently monitored during transport.

events.name: BatchPackageDispatched
events.description: To signify that a batch has been sent out for delivery.

events.name: BatchArrivalAtDestination
events.description: To confirm the arrival of a batch at its intended location.

events.name: BatchQualityCheckPassed
events.description: To confirm that the batch has passed quality checks upon arrival.

events.name: BatchTemperatureAlert
events.description: To alert stakeholders if the temperature rises beyond acceptable limits.

commands.name: TrackTemperature
commands.description: To ensure that temperature within the batch is consistently monitored during transport.

commands.name: DispatchBatch
commands.description: To signify that a batch has been sent out for delivery.

commands.name: ConfirmArrival
commands.description: To confirm the arrival of a batch at its intended location.

commands.name: QualityCheck
commands.description: To confirm that the batch has passed quality checks upon arrival.

commands.name: RaiseTemperatureAlert
commands.description: To alert stakeholders if the temperature rises beyond acceptable limits.

integrationPoints.name: TemperatureMonitoringService
integrationPoints.description: Integration with a dedicated service to monitor and manage temperature throughout the logistics.

integrationPoints.name: DispatchService
integrationPoints.description: Integration with the dispatch system to track and manage batch shipments.

integrationPoints.name: QualityAssuranceService
